name: Scaredy Squirrel: Stash N Crash
description:
Help Scaredy Squirrel stack his cans without falling in Scaredy Squirrel: Stash N Crash! Players try to remove one can at a time while keeping Scaredy from hitting the floor. Every level gets harder and higher, as players must use all their cunning and strategy to advance! Replay each level to get all 3 acorns to unlock secret levels that really test your stash n crashing skills!

• Intuitive yet challenging gameplay
• Unlock secret bonus levels!
• Use cans with different abilities, from exploding reds to vanishing blues!
• Keep bonus items from falling to beat your high store
• Over 30 crazy levels
